desc: * Offering a native Windows release, PostgreSQL 8.0 is poised to garner considerable market share in the open source arena. This book shows readers how to harness this popular open source database with PHP, the worldâ€™s most popular web scripting language.

details.authors: W Jason Gilmore, Robert H. Treat

title: Beginning PHP and PostgreSQL 8: From Novice to Professional (Beginning: From Novice to Professional)
